Class ec.transform.classparser.ExceptionsAttribute

public class ExceptionsAttribute
extends Attribute
An individual ExceptionsAttribute in the class file. An Exceptions attribute contains a list of checked exceptions a method may throw.

ExceptionsAttribute(ClassFile, int)
Build an empty Exceptions Attribute from arguments.

ExceptionsAttribute 
 public ExceptionsAttribute(ClassFile classFile,
                            int nameIndex)
Build an empty Exceptions Attribute from arguments. Bill is likely to replace this.
